data.text: @FlavioS49583587 We understand your situation, however, your case number 25873038 has taken more time that we expected. We've added internal notes on it in order to assist you. Once we receive an update, we'll contact you via phone call or email. Please stay tuned to your means of contact.

Our #NewWaysToFly include strict safety measures: There are HEPA filters in all our airplanes that maintain the cabin air at the same level as a hospital so that you can travel with peace of mind. https://t.co/auppYzotVO
@LisboaRol Please wait for our contact. Regards.

We are committed to keeping you informed, that's why we present to you the operational status of our main destinations. #NewWaystoFly. More information at https://t.co/BQJKIP9PAY https://t.co/FpNyHbUAhA

@FlavioS49583587 We understand your position, we are still working on your case, and we added your comments in order to acknowledge the need for a prompt reply, as soon as we have an update we will keep you informed via e-mail. Kind regards.

@Borbole41667645 Hello, we really understand your comments, but due to the ticket was directly booked and paid through a third party, they must help you with the refund. Do not hesitate to write us back in case you need our help. Regards

@FlavioS49583587 We understand your discomfort regarding the delay your case is taking. 
Your understanding is highly appreciated. We'll provide you further information via email when we have the corresponding resolution. Regards.
@FlavioS49583587 We are working on your case 25873038 and we will contact you. Regards.
@FlavioS49583587 Please send us a DM with your other ticket number or travel voucher number. Regards.

@FlavioS49583587 We understand that the reimbursement is taking more time than usual. As soon as we get a confirmation about your refund process of your Travel Voucher number, we will contact you via email. Regards.
@mardmc Hello, the refund was already paid as a travel voucher. Please check your email out. Do not hesitate to write us back in case you need our help. Regards.
@viiBelmonte Hi, we've provided you a reply via DM. Kind regards.
@FlavioS49583587 We've provided your further information via DM, please check. Regards.
@LisboaRol We've replied through DM, regards.
@Pedro1Natal Hi, we have sent you a DM. Thanks.
@FlavioS49583587 Flavio, please have the certainty that the wire transfer of your travel voucher is in process. Remember you will receive an email, when the transfer is finished. Regards.
@LisboaRol Hi, send us a DM with your booking code to look into it. Thanks.
@katriv77 Please write us through DM, with the booking code or ticket (13 digits) and confirm the name/last name of the passenger. We'll be awaiting your response.
@katriv77 Hola, para brindarte una asistencia más oportuna, te agradecemos nos indiques un idioma (español o inglés) para comunicarnos. Quedamos atentos.

@KarenMMorlock1 Hi, if you made the purchase through a travel agency, it's necessary that you request the refund to them. If you're the travel agent, you'll need to contact your Help Desk. Thank you for contacting us. We look forward to assisting you with further requests. Regards.
@lukaslucasnyc Olá, Lukas, boa tarde. Poderia nos detalhar por DM a sua solicitação e o seu código de reserva, para que possamos verificar o ocorrido. Estamos à disposição.
@jigneshwar We continue to work on your case 24835709. Rest assured that as soon as we have an answer, we will let you know through your email. Regards.
Because we live in a new world, we have #NewWaystoFly, with more safety and flexibility than ever, so you can purchase and travel with complete peace of mind. https://t.co/adPEupml22

@marcelopbelo Olá, boa tarde. Poderia nos informar por DM o código de reserva e o número do bilhete (e-ticket)? Iremos analisar algumas informações. Aguardamos o seu retorno, saiba que estamos à disposição.

@FlavioS49583587 Hello Flavio, in order to assist you, please send us through DM your ticket number, and the passenger full name. In addition, if you made a new purchase and you didn't receive the reservation code, please confirm us full name, e-mail address, routes and dates for the flights.
@kleinekappel Hi, please send us your full name and booking code. Regards.

@RheumSD Hi, in order to assist you, please let us know via DM the reservation code (6 capital letters) or the ticket number (13 digits) and one of the passengers' full names. We will be waiting for your response.

@Romeo20603657 Hi, we will continue to honor current and future tickets, frequent flyer points, vouchers and gift cards held by our customers, just as we did prior to our reorganization. We want all our passengers to know that we are continuing to operate through this process. Regards.

entity.description: Acompanhe abaixo os principais Tweets sobre o programa:

entity.name: Big Brother Brasil
entity.description:
Acompanhe as novidades da 20ª edição do BBB, confira as reações do pessoal ao programa de hoje e fique por dentro das movimentações e estratégias rolando dentro desta 'nave louca'. Será que seu brother/sister preferido irá vencer o prêmio de R$ 1,5 milhão? 

Foto via @BBB

data.text: @Klever13258626 Hello, let us know how can we assist you today. We will be waiting for your reply. Kind regards.
@KonejoBB At the following link you can check our official communication regarding this:https://t.co/Rl4InbBU6v. Feel free to contact us back in case of an additional query. Regards.

@KonejoBB Hi, we want all our customers to know that we are continuing to operate through our reorganization process and expect to emerge on a solid financial footing, ready to welcome you onboard. Our priority is to take care of the health of our employees, passengers and communities.

@Ananananais Hello Anais, in order to assist you, please send us through DM your ticket number or travel voucher number, passport number, email address, and full name. We'll be waiting for your response. Regards.

It’s so simple that it fits in a tweet! Buy with flexibility and reschedule your ticket once without penalties or fare difference, up to 12 months from the initial flight date. https://t.co/8K7d8x2AL8

@ayana_sprowl Hi, keep in mind that repatriation flights are special flights that are evaluated and authorized by the country's authorities. We suggest contacting your consulate for further information. Also, we have availability from Miami to Sao Paulo from June 7th. Regards.
@raphael73498803 Hi, we are working on your case number 25401055, and we will send you a response via email as soon as possible with a formal response. Please, wait for our contact. Regards.
@JacobBrehme we sent you a message via DM. Kind regards.
@queenlizbeth Hi, we answered you via DM. Regards.

@sfl310548 Hola, con referencia al correo que te llegó, te informamos que la categoría de tu programa, tus millas o puntos y tus beneficios generales al volar en LATAM o en una de nuestras aerolíneas asociadas serán respetados, no se tendrá pérdida de estos. Saludos.

@phillipwatts7 If you want to verify flights available for your reservation; write us back via DM; because any information regarding our passengers booking is private; however, if you want to buy a new flight, you can do it through this link: https://t.co/icSwul5qhI. Kind regards.

@globalement Hi, in order to provide you more information about the status of your refund, please send us your booking code or ticket number and your complete name via DM. We will be waiting for your reply. Regards.
@PriyanshuSangw9 Hello, we advise you to check our page regarding your question: https://t.co/doKFSUtrIh, and let us know if you have any other requirement. Kind regards.

@phillipwatts7 At the moment, we have those flights available; however, if your flight get cancelled; we can assist you with the change if you want; if you want to request anything else, let us know via DM. Kind regards.

#WeWillContinueToFly as we reorganize under U.S. Chapter 11 protection to navigate COVID-19 impacts, transforming our business to adapt to a new and evolving way of flying, and ensure long-term sustainability. Learn more: https://t.co/ZdWAGGhr9U https://t.co/bjYigYxcf1

We recently announced the reorganization process under Chapter 11 in the U.S. #WeWillContinueToFly and we want you to know that our operations will continue without any impact. For more information please visit https://t.co/mPQVA5eyVh
@jho635 We will wait for your reply.
@jho635 Please send us a DM with your full name and booking code. Regards.
@jho635 Hi, if your ticket belongs to a travel agency, we can not assist you with your refund. Regards.
@merinomanu Hi, we answer you via DM. Regards.
@JacobBrehme Hi, we answer you via DM. Regards.
@temphoranfix We replied to the message you sent via DM.
@temphoranfix To assist you, please give us via DM your booking code or ticket number, and the full name of the passenger. We'll be waiting for your response.

@temphoranfix Hello, we advise you to delete the cookies and temporary files from your browser and attempt it again, or use a different device; bear in mind that at the moment out website is working ok, and is the only way for you to purchase the extra bag other than the airport. Kind regards.
@Alexand62543074 Please send us a DM with your booking code or ticket number to give you more information. Regards.
@Alexand62543074 Hi, please send us a DM with your ticket number. Regards.
@rrcrazy23 We've replied through DM, please check, regards.
@ClaudiaLampe Hello, we really understand your comments, but due to the ticket was booked through an agency, you need to contact them to receive the refund option. Regards.

@leivieira Hello Leila, in order to provide you better assistance, please let us know through DM your full name, email address used at the purchase moment, passport number, route and dates of your flights. We'll be waiting for your response.
@raphael73498803 We replied to the message you sent via DM.

@Timsa05 Hi, to assist you, please give us via DM more details about your request, as well as your booking code or ticket number, and the full name of the passenger. Thank you for contacting us. We'll be waiting for your response.
@sergioschuler Olá Sérgio, poderia nos informar por DM a reserva, bilhete, e-mail e o CPF e telefone dela?
@_romualdoamaral Hi, please let us know if you need assistance in English or Portuguese. Regards.
@ClaudiaLampe We have sent you a DM. Regards.

@queenlizbeth Hi, to assist you properly, please let us know more details about your request. If you're contacting us regarding a pending refund, give us via DM your full name, ticket number and e-mail address. Your comments are very important to us. We'll be waiting for your response.
@ClaudiaLampe Hi, send us a DM with your booking code to look into it. Thanks.
@TravelBlondie_ Hello, due to the current situation we are refunding the tickets as travel vouchers, which you can use to purchase LATAM services or exchange for a bank transfer. Regards.
@itsmits_ We have sent you a DM. Regards.

@Arleen078 Hi, to assist you, it's necessary that you give us via DM your booking code or ticket number, and the full name of the passenger. Thank you for contacting us. We'll be waiting for your response.
@itsmits_ Hi, please send us a DM with your full name, booking code and more details of your request. Regards.

@viva_laLeah Hi, in order to assist you, please provide us via DM the reservation code and one of the passenger's full name. Also, we suggest you delete your public message since it contains confidential information regarding your flight. We will be waiting for your response. Regards.
@galucym Galucy, we recommend you staying tuned to our website, since if we open a new route, we will share the information to all our passengers through https://t.co/x1X3UC34NV. Regards.

#NewWaysToFly is all about relearning and redefining how we travel today. We have implemented higher hygiene and safety standards and a new flexibility policy. More info at https://t.co/LGyWm6N57z https://t.co/02SeoRI0sZ
@gabbymaddaluna We replied to the message you sent via DM.
@gabbymaddaluna Hello, to provide you a better assistance, please send us via DM the complete passenger's name and ticket number. We look forward to your reply. Regards.
@ManAviation1107 Hello Adam, in order to assist you, please let us know through DM your reservation code or ticket number, and the passenger's full name. We'll be waiting for your response. Regards.

@MagicCityAlex Hello Alexander, please be advise about the available flights in the next link: https://t.co/5lz7NqH3up, at this point there is not available flights out of Peru until the o1 of June. Let us know if you have more questions. Regards.

urls.title: Travel requirements | LATAM Airlines
urls.description: Know the restrictions to travel inside and outside of United States.

data.text: @Nath79356745 Hello, inn order to assist you. Please send us the complete passenger's name and the travel voucher number. We look forward to your reply. Regards.
@maskatira Hi, those are special flights, they are evaluated and authorized by the country's authorities. We suggest contacting your consulate for further information, regards.
@kimbrlymrie Hi, in order to provide you more information, please send us more information about your request via DM. We will be waiting for your reply. Regards.

@luci_peanut Hello, at the moment we don't have updates in our policies; however, we advise you to check our website and social media for updates related to the exceptions and maybe changing or extending our policies. Let us know if you have any other question. Kind regards.
@GeorgeMo Hello, we replied to your message via DM. Kind regards.
@GeorgeMo We replied to your message via DM. Kind regards.
@GeorgeMo After the study of your case, we provided you the final answer via e-mail on May 07th 2020. Kind regards.
@GeorgeMo Hello, we sent you a message via DM. Kind regards.
@cmyuk Hi, thanks for considering us. If your message is in regarding a business proposal, send us more details and complete contact information via DM in order to evaluate it. Kind regards.
@ohanish In case the agencies have any trouble processing the refund, they must contact us directly. Regards.

@ohanish Anish, since you have hired and paid for the service through a third party, the refund must be processed and issued by the agency you purchased through. Feel free to contact us for further assistance. Regards.
@Index_James We've sent you an answer through DM, regards.
@Index_James We've replied through DM, regards.

@barc_sara We understand you comments; however, because you requested the refund of the ticket, it cancelled the whole itinerary; and once the process starts, it can't be stopped. Let us know if you have another requirement. Kind regards.
@JacobBrehme We've replied through DM, regards.

@barc_sara Hello Sara, we apologize for the delayed reply; however, we verified that the refund request was made by the passenger through our website, and once the process starts, the whole ticket is cancelled and it can't be stopped. Let us know via DM if you have another request. Regards.

Your well-being is our most important concern. That's why we have adopted several measures to ensure that when you travel with us again, it will be in the safest way possible. #SafeFlight https://t.co/6Y9VrKZ1nK
@Cbowen1619 Hello, we sent you a message via DM. Regards.
@ChefBoyardBitch We have sent you a DM. Regards.
@ChefBoyardBitch Hi, please send us a DM with your full name and booking code. Regards.

@neekl42162528 Hi, we invite you to check out further information regarding the government restrictions in Chile, here: https://t.co/KuAibJ2lDY. Keep in mind that this is supplementary information, therefore, we suggest you to consult also with the correspondent authorities. Regards.
@HolimSeong Hi, if you need assistance, please send us a DM with more details. Regards.

@JacobBrehme Hello, we inform you that the exchange of your Travel Voucher is still in process, due to the high demand of request the process is taking more than the regular period. Bear in mind that we are still working in order to complete your request as soon as possible. Kind regards.
@Tom64397504 Hi, we sent you a response via DM. Regards.
@Tom64397504 Tom let us know via DM your reservation code in order to validate the information. We will be waiting for your reply. Kind regards.
